price: [به او گفتیم:] «این عطای ماست؛ بی‌شمار [به هر که می‌خواهی] ببخش یا [از هر کس كه می‌خواهى] بازدار».
arabic: هَٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمۡنُنۡ أَوۡ أَمۡسِكۡ بِغَيۡرِ حِسَابٖ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā ʿaṭāunā fa-um'nun aw amsik bighayri ḥisābin
